communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: Trip to El Salvador
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

Emails sent to or received from El Salvador's government regarding the September 2023 visit of Sheriff Errol Toulon and Deputy Sheriff Kevin Catalina to El Salvador. You may limit the search to the period between February 2023 and the date this request is received.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Matthew Petti

title: Law Enforcement Agencies accessing statewide LexisNexis/West personal information databases

communications.subject: Michigan Freedom of Information Act Request: Law Enforcement Agencies accessing statewide LexisNexis/West personal information databases
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am seeking any agreements, documents, reports, communications, lists, logs or datasets showing the names of the state and local law enforcement agencies that have bought or can use services through the following Personal Information Database contracts:  LexisNexis Risk Solutions, Contract #: 200000000664 and West Publishing Corporation, a Thomson Reuters business, Contract #: 200000000689.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Paul Tepper

title: NIAID collaboration with "American Masters" (PBS) episode on Dr. Anthony Fauci

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: NIAID collaboration with "American Masters" (PBS) episode on Dr. Anthony Fauci
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any records pertaining to NIAID involvement with the production of the March 21, 2023, episode of "American Masters" on PBS featuring Dr. Anthony Fauci. The documentary was filmed in 2021, when Dr. Fauci was still the director of NIAID. I request any and all documents pertaining to NIAID involvement, including but not limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of NIAID and this PBS production.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

title: Request to NIAID for all records of TV  and film collaborations

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Request to NIAID for all records of TV  and film collaborations
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All records, within the record retention schedule/guidelines, pertaining to National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases (NIAID) participation with television and film productions. These records may include, but should not be limited to: lists of TV and film collaborations; production assistance agreements relating to such collaborations; script notes; and all records of communications between employees of NIAID and members of the entertainment industry. I request that you search for these documents in any location where they might be located, including but not limited to the entertainment liaison offices and communications HQ.

All records, within the record retention schedule/guidelines, pertaining to Centers for Disease Control (CDC) participation with television and film productions. These records may include, but should not be limited to: lists of TV and film collaborations; production assistance agreements relating to such collaborations; script notes; and all records of communications between employees of CDC and members of the entertainment industry. I request that you search for these documents in any location where they might be located, including but not limited to the entertainment liaison offices and communications HQ.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo
